r.s: Analyze exceptions, php and PEAR errors visually
r.d: Displays Exceptions, PHP Erros and PEAR_Error objects in a nice and clean way. It also allows to inspect parameters passed to methods and to drag and drop the files causing the error to any editor. Copying a string representation of the exception to clipboard is also supported.
r.n: - Don't show php errors when they are silenced using @
